TX.name: Texas
TX.board_name: Texas State Board of Plumbing Examiners
TX.summary: Texas requires both exam passage and documented work experience. Reciprocity available from select states.

CA.name: California
CA.summary: California uses a contractor license system. C-36 classification covers plumbing work.

FL.name: Florida
FL.board_name: Florida Department of Business and Professional Regulation
FL.summary: Application submitted. Awaiting exam date. Florida requires state exam plus local jurisdiction permits.

WA.name: Washington
WA.board_name: Washington State Department of Labor & Industries
WA.summary: Washington has a journey level system. Requires passing state exam and 8,000 hours documented experience.

NY.name: New York
NY.board_name: NYC Department of Buildings (varies by jurisdiction)
NY.summary: New York licensing varies by jurisdiction. NYC has specific requirements. Research needed for target area.

AZ.name: Arizona
AZ.summary: Arizona requires contractor registration for residential and commercial work. Considering future expansion.

CO.name: Colorado
CO.summary: Colorado has local jurisdiction licensing. Denver requires city license. Statewide license available for specific work types.

NV.name: Nevada
NV.summary: Currently gathering experience documentation for Nevada application. Requires 4 years verifiable experience.
